overview:
Martin Tantow is a senior advisor with Booz & Company, delivering strategic growth assessments for leading technology firm in the US and building the companyâ€™s footprint in Silicon Valley.

Martin serves as President & Founder of Amiro Consulting, a leading digital marketing and cloud consulting company for SaaS (software as a service) technologies in sales, marketing and customer relationship management (CRM).

In 2007, Martin co-founded 3scale networks. 3scale is a leading provider of cloud computing infrastructure with scalable & cost-efficient Web Service management tools. He has built the company from zero to a leading player in the industry with renowned customers in e-commerce, online media, enterprise services and Internet infrastructure.

Previously, he was a senior executive advisor with Oliver Wyman where he orchestrated the commercial launch of two new mobile network operators in Europe and the Middle East, winning market leadership in each country within two years. For T-Mobile International he managed freemove, a global strategic mobile operator alliance. He began his career with Siemens in 1997 and has also held management positions with Lufthansa, Droege & Comp and Viant.

Martin holds an MBA from Munich School of Management, Germany.
